restaurants.name: Example Restaurant 1
restaurants.description: A cozy Italian restaurant serving up delicious pizza and pasta dishes.

items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil

items.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
items.description: Spaghetti with meat sauce made with ground beef, tomatoes, and spices

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing

restaurants.name: Example Restaurant 2
restaurants.description: A trendy new restaurant with a menu featuring modern American cuisine.

items.name: Beef Burger
items.description: Angus beef patty with lettuce, tomato, and pickles

items.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Grilled chicken breast with avocado, bacon, and chipotle mayo

items.name: Vegan Cobb Salad
items.description: Mixed greens, tomatoes, avocado, chickpeas, and vegan bacon bits

restaurants.name: Example Restaurant 3
restaurants.description: A classic diner serving up breakfast all day and comfort food favorites.

items.name: Pancakes
items.description: Three fluffy pancakes with butter and maple syrup

items.name: Meatloaf
items.description: Homestyle meatloaf with mashed potatoes and gravy

items.name: Club Sandwich
items.description: Turkey, ham, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayo on toasted bread

restaurants.name: Example Restaurant 4
restaurants.description: A casual spot for beer and pub grub, with a focus on locally sourced ingredients.

items.name: Fish and Chips
items.description: Beer-battered cod with fries and tartar sauce
